reviewText: Replacing an old VHS, always a heartwarming story, great example of family Christmas story, and Max Lucado's work is superb
I'm glad I found the dvd!
I love the the book and have high hopes for this DVD!
There are too few movies of godly perspective for life's problems and disappointments.  I have a special needs granddaughter, and she loves this movie.

Both my wife and I are quite pleased that we were able to get this DVD. It is a rare item especially the Alabaster's Song which is an extra clip on this DVD. Hopefully this kind of children's entertainment will make its way back into today's society as we are lacking good Christian values as the generations keep passing by.
